title: S4 Ep149: Love Island's Shannon and Josh on The Morning Toast: Friday, August 20th 2021
itunes:title: Love Island's Shannon and Josh on The Morning Toast: Friday, August 20th 2021
description:
Shannon St. Clair and Josh Goldstein join Claudia on The Morning Toast to discuss this season of Love Island, their current relationship and what they thought about all of the drama that went down.

The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Jackie Oshry (@jackieoshry)
Merch: https://shopmorningtoast.com/
The Morning Toast Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/themorningtoast
Girl With No Job by Claudia Oshry: https://www.girlwithnojob.com/book
